Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

This landmark is an advanced energy sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000359]Cryo-Medical Facility[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级能量区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000359]冷冻医疗设施[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced energy sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{EnergyFlat}, {EnergySlot}.[br/]{ProductionFlat}, {ProductionSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD00000359]Cryo-Medical Facility[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级能量区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{EnergyFlat}，{EnergySlot}。[br/]{ProductionFlat}，{ProductionSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD00000359]冷冻医疗设施[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000032B]Heavy Duty Manufacturing Plant[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000032B]重工制造厂[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{ProductionFlat}, {ProductionSlot}.[br/]{ResearchFlat}, {ResearchSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD0000032B]Heavy Duty Manufacturing Plant[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{ProductionFlat}，{ProductionSlot}。[br/]{ResearchFlat}，{ResearchSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD0000032B]重工制造厂[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced research sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/][bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot} [/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000033A]Shrine of Darkness[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级研究区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/][bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot} [/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000033A]黑暗神庙[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced research sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{ResearchFlat}, {ResearchSlot}.[br/]{EnergyFlat}, {EnergySlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000033A]Shrine of Darkness[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级研究区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{ResearchFlat}，{ResearchSlot}、[br/]{EnergyFlat}，{EnergySlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000033A]黑暗神庙[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000335]Genetics Lab[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000335]基因实验室[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{FoodFlat}, {FoodSlot}.[br/]{ResearchFlat}, {ResearchSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000335]Genetics Lab[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]
该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{FoodFlat}，{FoodSlot}、[br/]{ResearchFlat}，{ResearchSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000335]基因实验室[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000369]Spaceship Maintenance Bay[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000369]星际飞船维护港[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{ProductionFlat}, {ProductionSlot}.[br/]{EnergyFlat}, {EnergySlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD00000369]Spaceship Maintenance Bay[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{ProductionFlat}，{ProductionSlot}。[br/]{EnergyFlat}，{EnergySlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD00000369]星际飞船维护港[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{HappinessFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{HappinessSlot} [/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following to be built in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000365]Relaxation Center[/hyperlink][/bullet][Bullet][hyperlink,0000038500000313]Roy-2[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038500000314]Emma-3[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{HappinessFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{HappinessSlot} [/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建造物：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000365]休闲中心[/hyperlink][/bullet][Bullet][hyperlink,0000038500000313]罗伊-2[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038500000314]艾玛-3[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{FoodFlat}, {FoodSlot}.[br/]{HappinessFlat}, {HappinessSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following to be built in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD00000365]Relaxation Center[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,0000038500000313]Roy-2[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000038500000314]Emma-3[/hyperlink].

该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{FoodFlat}，{FoodSlot}。[br/]{HappinessFlat}，{HappinessSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建造物：[hyperlink,000003BD00000365]休闲中心[/hyperlink]，[hyperlink,0000038500000313]罗伊-2[/hyperlink] 和[hyperlink,0000038500000314]艾玛-3[/hyperlink]。

This landmark is an advanced research sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000035D]Imperial Training Center[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级研究区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD0000035D]帝国训练中心[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级研究区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{ResearchFlat}，{ResearchSlot}。[br/]{FoodFlat}，{FoodSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD0000035D]帝国训练中心[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000326]Weapons Facility[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000326]武器设施[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced production sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000326]Weapons Facility[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级产力区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000326]武器设施[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{HappinessFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{HappinessSlot/}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000330]Starlight Observatory[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{FoodFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{FoodSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{HappinessFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{HappinessSlot/}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000330]星光观测台[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced food sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{FoodFlat}, {FoodSlot}.[br/]{HappinessFlat}, {HappinessSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD00000330]Starlight Observatory[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级食物区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{FoodFlat}，{FoodSlot}。[br/]{HappinessFlat}，{HappinessSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD00000330]星光观测台[/hyperlink]

This landmark is an advanced energy sector, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000304]Rift Generator[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为高级能量区域，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{ProductionFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ProductionSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00000304]裂隙生成器[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

This landmark is an advanced energy sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{EnergyFlat}, {EnergySlot}.[br/]{ProductionFlat}, {ProductionSlot}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD00000304]Rift Generator[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级能量区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{EnergyFlat}，{EnergySlot}。[br/]{ProductionFlat}，{ProductionSlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD00000304]裂隙生成器[/hyperlink]

An old Star Union sector base which is still operational. It acts as a pre-built food exploitation and provides {SupplyFlat} and {SupplySlots}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD000004B2]Nutrition Center[/hyperlink]
一个仍在运作的古老的星际联盟区域基地，可作为预建造食物开发点，并提供 {SupplyFlat} 和 {SupplySlots}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD000004B2]营养中心[/hyperlink]
Star Union is the name of the empire in our game, see the lore.

An old Star Union sector base which is still operational. It acts as a pre-built energy exploitation and provides {EnergyFlat} and {EnergySlots}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD000004AC]Shielding Laboratory[/hyperlink]
一个仍在运作的古老的星际联盟区域基地，可作为预建造能量开发点，并提供 {EnergyFlat} 和 {EnergySlots}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD000004AC]护盾实验室[/hyperlink]

An old Star Union sector base which is still operational. It acts as a pre-built production exploitation and provides {ProductionFlat} and {ProductionSlots}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD000004B7]Reinforcement Factory[/hyperlink]
一个仍在运作的古老的星际联盟区域基地，可作为预建造产力开发点，并提供 {ProductionFlat} 和 {ProductionSlots}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD000004B7]强化工厂[/hyperlink]

An old Star Union sector base which is still operational. It acts as a pre-built research exploitation and provides {ResearchFlat} and {ResearchSlots}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003BD000004AD]Learning Center[/hyperlink]
一个仍在运作的古老的星际联盟区域基地，可作为预建造研究开发点，并提供 {ResearchFlat} 和 {ResearchSlots}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD000004AD]学习中心[/hyperlink]

An old naval Star Union sector base which is still operational. It acts as a pre-built water exploitation and provides {EnergyFlat}, {ResearchFlat} and {FoodFlat} as well as and {EnergySlots}, {ResearchSlots} and {FoodSlots}.[br/][br/]Additionally, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[hyperlink,000003BD00001921]Aquatic Training Facility[/hyperlink]
一个仍在运作的古老星际联盟区域基地，可作为预建造水域开发点，提供 {EnergyFlat}、{ResearchFlat} 和 {FoodFlat}以及 {EnergySlots}、{ResearchSlots} 和 {FoodSlots}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003BD00001921]水上训练设施[/hyperlink]

A war monument honoring ancient heroes of the Star Union, filling troops with determination. It provides {ImperialWarMonumentAcc} increased accuracy to visiting units for their next combat.[br/][br/]The Imperial War Monument adds {happiness} when it is within a colony's domain.
一个记有星际联盟古代英雄和死去士卒的战争纪念碑，能够使拜访单位在下次战斗时准度提升 {ImperialWarMonumentAcc}。[br/][br/]帝国战争纪念碑位于殖民地区域内时可增加{happiness}。
This unit has visited an Imperial War Monument, which strengthened its resolve for combat. Its accuracy has been increased by {ImperialWarMonumentAcc} for their next combat.
该单位最近拜访过帝国战争纪念碑，战斗的决心变得更加坚定。下次战斗时准度提升 {ImperialWarMonumentAcc}。

An old heavy weapons factory specialized in experimental weapon improvements. It provides {HeavyWeaponsDamage} increased damage to visiting units for their next combat.[br/][br/]The Heavy Weapons Factory adds {Production} when it is within a colony's domain.
一处致力于研究实验性武器升级的重型武器工厂，能够使拜访单位在下次战斗时伤害提升 {HeavyWeaponsDamage}。[br/][br/]重型武器工厂位于殖民地区域内时可增加{Production}。
This unit's weapons have been modified to deal {Damage} damage during their next combat.
该单位的武器经过了改造，下次战斗时造成伤害变为 {Damage}。
An old Paragon Repair Station that restores full [hp/] to visiting units. [br/][br/]The Repair Station adds {production} when it is within a colony's domain.
一处古老的完人修理站，可为拜访单位恢复全部[hp/]。[br/][br/]当修理站位于殖民地区域内时可增加{production}。

Plays automated concerts of long-forgotten bands. Visiting units gain {StadiumArcadiumMorale} morale for their next battle. [br/][br/]The Stadium Arcadium adds {happiness} when it is within a colony's domain.
这里自动播放着被遗忘乐队的曲目，可使拜访单位在下次战斗时获得 {StadiumArcadiumMorale} 士气。[br/][br/]星际体育场位于殖民地区域内时可增加{happiness}。
This unit has recently visited a Stadium. Its morale been raised by {StadiumArcadiumMorale}.
该单位最近拜访过体育场，士气提高 {StadiumArcadiumMorale}。
Fully restores all move points of visiting units.[br/][br/]The Milestone Charge Station adds {energy} when it is within a colony's domain.
为拜访单位恢复全部移动点数。[br/][br/]里程碑充能站位于殖民地区域内时可增加{energy}。

The Psi-Shrine grants {shields}, {PsionicResistance} and {damage} damage for Psionic attacks for all visiting units during their next combat.[br/][br/]The Psi-Shrine adds {research} when it is within a colony's domain.
灵能试探可使所有拜访单位在下次战斗时获得{shields}，{PsionicResistance}和 {damage} 灵能攻击伤害。[br/][br/]灵能圣坛位于殖民地区域内时可增加{research}。
This unit has visited a Psi-Shrine and received {shields} and {psiResistance} for their next combat. In addition, their Psionic attacks deal {DamageIncrease} damage.
该单位最近拜访过灵能圣坛，下次战斗时获得{shields}和{psiResistance}。另外，灵能攻击可造成 {DamageIncrease} 伤害。

An old Imperial Seed vault, used to store DNA samples and seeds of all varieties of creatures and vegetation for research purposes. Visiting units gain {experience} experience during their next combat.[br/][br/]The DNA Vault adds {food} when it is within a colony's domain.
一处古老的帝国基因宝库，储存有用于研究的基因样本和各种生物和植物的种子，可使拜访单位在下次战斗时获得 {experience} 经验。[br/][br/]基因宝库位于殖民地区域内时可增加{food}。
This unit gains {experience} experience during their next combat.
该单位下次战斗时获得 {experience} 经验。

An old, abandoned terraforming outpost that still has some supplies left, including some imperial-grade stimulants that boost the immune system. Visiting units gain {Resistance} to all resistances for their next combat. [br/][br/]The Terraforming Outpost adds {food} when it is within a colony's domain.
这座被遗弃的改造前哨虽然古老，但里面仍有一些补给残留，其中包括一些能够增强免疫系统的帝国级刺激剂。拜访单位在下次战斗时获得 {Resistance} 全抗。[br/][br/]改造前哨位于殖民地区域内时能够增加{food}。
Imperial-grade stimulants are a kind of drug you can inject yourself with to boost your immune system / resistance
This unit is under the effect of imperial-grade stimulants and has a boosted immune system. All of its resistances are increased by {resistance}.
该单位仍处在帝国级别刺激剂的影响下，免疫系统得到全面提升，全抗提高 {resistance}。
Gravity Generators are used as a non-combat deterrent to both enemy forces and wildlife.
重力生成器虽然不具备杀伤力，但却对敌军和野生动物具有威胁效果。

[bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] movement cost in this sector is increased by {MovementCost} per hex on the world map.[/bullet][bullet]In combat:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] units have [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] movement speed.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]在世界地图上，[abilityred]敌人[/abilityred]在该区域内每个单元格的移动消耗提高 {MovementCost}。[/bullet][bullet]在战斗中：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet][abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位拥有[abilityred]缓慢[/abilityred]移动速度。[/bullet]

Slow movement speed means the unit has less move points and moves slower on the world map. A hex has a movepoint cost(movement cost), and a unit has a number of move points. A unit spends movepoints equivalent to a hex's movepoint cost to move unto that hex.
Due to an active gravity generator in the sector, this unit has its gravity artificially increased. It has slow movement speed.
由于该区域内存在已激活的中立生成器，该单位受到的重力提高，移动速度因此降低。
All units have slow movement speed due to an active Gravity Generator in the sector.
所有单位均受到了该区域内重力生成器的影响，移动速度降低。
Targeting Arrays are used to get accurate locations of force movements for a tactical advantage.
瞄准阵列用于获得移动单位的准确位置，得到战略优势。

[bulletList][bullet]Vision and sensor range for units in this sector is increased by {sensorRange}.[/bullet][bullet][abilityblue]Friendly[/abilityblue] units gain Detection.[/bullet][bullet]In combat, ranged abilities from [abilityblue]friendly[/abilityblue] units gain {accuracybuff} and {rangebuff} hex range.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]位于该区域内单位的视野和传感器范围提高 {sensorRange}。[/bullet][bullet][abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位获得“侦察”。[/bullet][bullet]在战斗中，[abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位的远程技能获得 {accuracybuff} 和 {rangebuff} 单元格范围加成。[/bullet]

Due to a targeting array boosting this unit, this unit gains the following: [bulletList][bullet]its vision and sensor range is increased by {sensorRange} hexes.[/bullet][bullet]It gains detection.[/bullet][bullet]This unit's Ranged abilities gain {accuracybuff} and {rangebuff} hex range.[/bullet]
该单位受到瞄准阵列强化，获得以下增益：[bulletList][bullet]视野和传感器范围提高 {sensorRange} 个单元格。[/bullet][bullet]获得“侦察”。[/bullet][bullet]远程技能获得 {accuracybuff} 和 {rangebuff} 单元格范围加成。[/bullet]
Detection allows units to see other units that would otherwise be camouflaged and invisible.
This unit gains Detection from the targeting array.
该单位因瞄准阵列的效果获得“侦察”。
Ranged abilities from [abilityblue]friendly[/abilityblue] units gain {accuracybuff} and {rangebuff} hex range.
[abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位的远程技能获得 {accuracybuff} 和 {rangebuff} 单元格范围加成。
Operation points are a resource that is spent to cast operations.
Operational Scramblers were often used by the Empire to block areas from counter intelligence operations and spying satelites.
帝国经常使用行动扰码器对区域进行屏蔽以反制情报行动和间谍卫星。
[bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] operations are not possible in this sector, both on the world map and in tactical combat.[/bullet]
[bulletList][bullet]无论是位于世界地图还是在战术战斗中，[abilityred]敌人[/abilityred]都无法在该区域实施行动。[/bullet]
Operations are not possible in this sector due to an active Operation Scrambler in the sector.
由于该区域内存在激活的行动扰码器，所以无法在该区域实施行动。
Pulse Defense Turrets are advanced anti-vehicle turrets that can disable and take out an enemy's heavy fire support at range.
脉冲防御炮塔为先进的反载具炮塔，可远距离瘫痪并消灭敌方的重型火力支援。

[bulletList][bullet]In combat, every {turns}[turn/] turns:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]All [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] Mechanical and Cyborg units suffer {TCdamage} Arc damage.[/bullet][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] Mechanical and Cyborg units have a strength {Stunchance} chance to be [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {Stunduration}.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]在战斗中，每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]所有[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]机械和半机械人单位受到 {TCdamage} 电弧伤害。[/bullet][bullet][abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]机械和半机械人单位有 {Stunchance} 力量几率陷入[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {Stunduration}。[/bullet]
Mechanical and Cyborg are unit types, that determine whether or not some abilities and status effects can affect them. Stunned is a negative status effect that makes a unit unable to move or act.

Every {turns} turns, the battlefield is struck by an Arc pulse, dealing {TCdamage} Arc damage to all [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] Mechanical and Cyborg units with a strength {Stunchance} chance to cause [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {Stunduration}.
每 {turns} 个回合，战场便会受到一次电弧脉冲的袭击，对所有[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]机械和半机械人单位造成 {TCdamage} 电弧伤害，并有 {Stunchance} 力量几率使其陷入[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {Stunduration}。
This unit is engaged by the Pulse Defense Turret in this sector. Their world map regeneration is blocked.
该单位受到了该区域内脉冲防御炮塔的攻击，位于世界地图时的生命再生遭到禁用。
regeneration is the amount of hit points (hp) that a unit regains each turn on the world map.
The ADS is found near areas of controlled airspace to discourage any adventurous interpretation of airspace borders. They are highly effective in dealing with any airborne presence.
在控制领空的附近区域内发现 ADS，不要冒险进入领空。这种系统非常擅于应对空中单位。

[bulletList][bullet]In combat, every {turns}[turn/] turn: [/bullet][bulletList][bullet]A random [abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] Flying unit suffers {TCdamage} Kinetic damage and the Turbulence debuff for {turnsTurbulence} turns.[/bullet]
[bulletList][bullet]在战斗中，每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]一名随机[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]飞行单位受到 {TCdamage} 动能伤害和“颠簸”减益效果，持续 {turnsTurbulence} 回合。[/bullet]
Turbulence is a negative status effect that affects flying units, making them less accurate with their attacks.
This unit is engaged by the Aerial Denial System in this sector. Their world map regeneration is blocked.
该单位受到了该区域内空中否决系统的攻击，位于世界地图时的生命再生遭到禁用。
Every turn, a missile will target a random [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] Flying unit, dealing {TCdamage} Kinetic damage and applying the Turbulence debuff for {turns} turns.
每回合都会向一名随机[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]飞行单位发射导弹，造成 {TCdamage} 动能伤害并施加“颠簸”减益效果，持续 {turns} 回合。
This uplink was originally created to allow for constant communication with the planet's orbital defense platform. It is still active and targeting hostile forces in this sector.
该上行链路原本作为星球轨道防御平台之间的通讯系统使用，现可帮助对该区域内的敌对势力进行标记。

[bulletList][bullet]In combat, every {turns} turns:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{units} random enemy units suffer {TCdamage} Kinetic damage.[/bullet][bullet]Non-resistant units will become [abilityred]Staggered[/abilityred].[/bullet]
[bulletList][bullet]在战斗中，每 {turns} 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{units} 个随机敌方单位受到 {TCdamage} 动能伤害。[/bullet][bullet]未抵抗的单位会陷入[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。[/bullet]
Stagger is a negative effect that can be applied to enemy units that means they are less effective.
The battlefield is bombarded every {turns} turns, dealing {TCdamage} Kinetic damage to {units} random enemy units and causing [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred].
战场每 {turns} 个回合受到一次轰击，对随机 {units} 名敌方单位造成 {TCdamage} 动能伤害并使其陷入[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。
This unit is engaged by the Orbital Defense Uplink in this sector. Their world map regeneration is blocked.
该单位受到了该区域内轨道防御上行链路的攻击，位于世界地图时的生命再生遭到禁用。

The Shroud Generator is an ancient Imperial device that was used by the military to deny vision and intel to enemy forces. Special equipment can negate the effects of the shroud generator, providing forces using them an advantage in combat.
隐蔽生成器是一种古代帝国设备，军方曾用来阻断敌方的视线和情报。特殊装备可抵消隐蔽生成器的效果，在适当的时机使用可以取得意想不到的效果。

[bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] units have {VisionRange} vision range while in this sector.[/bullet][bullet]In combat:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]Units without Detection have the maximum range of all of their abilities reduced to {WeaponRangeTC} hexes.[bullet/]
[bulletList][bullet]位于该区域的[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位拥有 {VisionRange} 视野范围。[/bullet][bullet]在战斗中：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]不具备“侦察”能力的单位，其所有技能的最远射程降低至 {WeaponRangeTC} 个单元格。[bullet/]
Vision range is how far a unit can see on the world map. It gets reduced in sectors with the Shroud Generator.
[abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] units without Detection have the maximum range of all of their abilities reduced to {WeaponRangeTC} hexes.
不具备侦察能力的[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位的技能最远射程降低至 {WeaponRangeTC} 个单元格。
This unit is engaged by the Shroud Generator in this sector. Their world map regeneration is blocked.
该单位受到了该区域内隐蔽生成器的攻击，位于世界地图时的生命再生遭到禁用。
This Star Union era Teleport Station is still functional. Use it to find out where it leads.[br/][br/]The Teleport Station adds {energy} when it is within a colony's domain.
这个来自星际联盟时代的传送站仍在运作，利用它来找出源头。[br/][br/]传送站位于殖民地领域内时可增加 {energy}。
Go to the facility to which this station is connected.
前往与传送站相连的设施。

The vault is a treasure trove of valuable data. By dedicating researchers to delving the archives, our Promethean technologies will benefit greatly.[br/][br/]Promethean tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Promethean units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Promethean commanders[/orange]
这座宝库装满了珍贵的数据，经过调查人员的刻苦研究，我们在圣火科技方面的收获颇丰。[br/][br/]圣火科技的研究消耗降低 {ResearchReduction}，圣火单位生产所需的[energy/]降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限圣火指挥官使用[/orange]

The sanctorum contains many dark secrets. By dedicating researchers to delving the archives, our Psynumbra techologies will benefit greatly.[br/][br/]Psynumbra tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Psynumbra units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Psynumbra commanders[/orange]
这座圣所装满了黑暗的秘辛，经过调查人员的刻苦研究，我们在赛努布拉科技方面的收获颇丰。[br/][br/]赛努布拉科技的研究费用降低 {ResearchReduction}，赛努布拉单位生产所需的[energy/]降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限赛努布拉指挥官使用[/orange]

The complex is a treasure trove of valuable data. By dedicating researchers to delving the archives, our Voidtech research will benefit greatly![br/][br/]Voidtech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Voidtech units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Voidtech commanders[/orange]
这座建筑群装满了珍贵的数据，经过调查人员的刻苦研究，我们在虚空科技方面的收获颇丰。[br/][br/]虚空科技的研究费用降低 {ResearchReduction}，虚空科技单位生产所需的[energy/]降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限虚空科技指挥官使用[/orange]

The archives contain both wisdom and light. By dedicating researchers to delving the archives, our Celestial techologies will benefit greatly![br/][br/]Celestial tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Celestial units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Celestian commanders[/orange]
这座档案馆内装满了光明与智慧，经过调查人员的刻苦研究，我们在星神科技方面的收获颇丰。[br/][br/]星神科技的研究费用降低 {ResearchReduction}，星神单位生产所需的[energy/]降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限星神指挥官使用[/orange]

If we integrate this Synthesis network with our research centers, our Synthesis techologies will benefit greatly.[br/][br/]Synthesis tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Synthesis units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Synthesis commanders[/orange]
如果我们将这个合成这网络与我们的研究中心进行合并，我们在合成科技方面的收获一定会颇丰。[br/][br/]合成科技的研究费用降低 {ResearchReduction}，合成单位的生产所需的[energy/]降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限合成指挥官使用[/orange]

The lab contains a wealth of experimental viruses and tissue samples. By dedicating researchers to exploring the material, our Xenoplague techologies will benefit greatly.[br/][br/]Xenoplague tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and all spawned Xenoplague units gain {HealthPoints} multiplied with their tier.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Xenoplague commanders[/orange]
这座实验室内拥有无数实验病毒和组织样本。经过调查人员的刻苦研究，我们在异星疫病科技方面的研究一定能收获颇丰。[br/][br/]异星疫病科技的研究消耗降低 {ResearchReduction}，所有生成的异星疫病单位获得 {HealthPoints}。阶级越高，获得的越多。[br/][br/][orange]仅限异星疫病指挥官使用[/orange]
This unit has gained {HealthModefier} as a result of discoveries made by researching old Xenotech samples.
由于在研究古代异星技术样本方面取得的发现，该单位获得{HealthModefier}。

By integrating the spaceport's satellite network systems with our own tactical networks, we can make pinpoint tactical strikes with far greater speed and efficiency.[br/][br/]The energy cost of tactical operations is reduced by {EnergyReduction}. In addition, tactical operations can now be deployed in the first turn of combat.
通过将太空站的卫星网络系统与我们的战术网络进行整合，我们的定点战术打击速度和效率均得到了大幅提升。[br/][br/]战术行动的能量消耗降低 {EnergyReduction}。另外，战术行动先可在战斗的第一回合进行部署。
tactical operations are kind of like spells a player can use in combat.

Trips to the Elysium Park were renowned for their ability to restore the morale and vitality of the most miserable souls. We could embed 'assets' from the park with our military units, greatly boosting morale and vitality.[br/][br/]All non-Mindless units gain {AddedMorale}. Biological and Cyborg units also gain {hitPointsPoints}.
前往极乐公园不仅能恢复士气，还能对灵魂进行治愈，即使它已经千疮百孔。我们可以将公园内的“资产”整合到我们的部队中，极大地提高部队的士气与生命力。[br/][br/]所有非无意识单位均获得{AddedMorale}，生物和半机械人单位也将获得 {hitPointsPoints}。

The governance palace is at the heart of a planetary communications network that we can use to spread propaganda across the globe, greatly increasing our international standing.[br/][br/]You gain {AddedReputation} and {AddedRelation} relations with all races.
权力大殿是星球通讯网络的中枢，我们可以在此向整个星球进行宣传，极大地提高我们的国际影响力。[br/][br/]你获得{AddedReputation}和全种族关系{AddedRelation}。

The population of the cryo facility has been asleep for a long time, but with sufficient energy and preparation they could be brought back en masse to repopulate our colonies. However, our own citizens may not be pleased with this move…[br/][br/]Target colony instantly gains {AddedPopulation}, but also suffers from Major Unrest ({HappinessModefier}) for {Turns}.
冷冻设施内的生物已经沉睡了很长一段时间，只要能够提供足够的能量和准备工作，他们就能再次复苏，帮助我们建设殖民地。虽然，我们的居民们可能会对这个行为感到不满......[br/][br/]目标殖民地立刻获得{AddedPopulation}，但会陷入重度不安（{HappinessModefier}），持续 {Turns}。
You were successful in waking up some of the population sleeping in the cryo facility. However, your population is not pleased with this move and will be unhappy for some time.
你成功地唤醒了冷冻设施内的一些生物，但是，殖民地原有的居民对这一行为感到了不满，并可能会持续一段时间。

At the start of each of the defender's turns, the Government Palace's regency engine chooses a random defending unit as its champion, granting it {ChampionProtocolDefense} damage resistance and {ChampionProtocolDamageBoost} increased damage on all abilities.
在防守者回合开始时，权力大殿的摄政引擎会随机选择一名防守单位成为捍卫者，使其获得 {ChampionProtocolDefense} 伤害减免，所有技能的伤害提升 {ChampionProtocolDamageBoost}。
This unit has been chosen as a champion, granting it {ChampionProtocolDefense} damage resistance and {ChampionProtocolDamageBoost} increased damage on all abilities.
该单位已被选为捍卫者，获得了 {ChampionProtocolDefense} 伤害减免，所有技能的伤害提升 {ChampionProtocolDamageBoost}。
冷冻设施：苏醒的守护者
Every {turns}[turn/], more of the cryo facility's denizens awaken, summoning {AwakenedGuardiansNumber} Paragon Troopers or Guards for the defender until the end of combat.
每 {turns}[turn/]，冷冻设施内就会出现更多的苏醒者，为防守者召唤出 {AwakenedGuardiansNumber} 完人士兵或守卫，召唤单位持续至战斗结束。
Paragon troopers are like cyborg zombie soldiers, can be assumed male Paragon Trooper and Paragon Guards are the unit names.
Every {turns}[turn/], the defenders resupply from the space port, gaining stacking {armor}, healing them for {Healing} and resetting their ability cooldowns.
每 {turns}[turn/]，防守者便会获得太空站的补给，获得 {armor}，{Healing} 治疗，并重置技能冷却。

Defenders have {MeritsOfBlissCritBonus} increased critical hit chance. Every {turns}[turn/], the entrancing atmosphere of the Elysium Parks takes hold. Attacking units have a strength {HalucinationStrength} chance to start [abilityred]Hallucinating[/abilityred] for {HalucinationDuration}[turn/].
防守者的暴击率提高 {MeritsOfBlissCritBonus}。每{turns}[turn/]，极乐公园迷人的氛围便会感染敌军。进攻单位有 {HalucinationStrength} 力量几率出现[abilityred]幻觉[/abilityred]，持续 {HalucinationDuration}[turn/]。
Hallucinating is a negative status effect that cause units to be unable to act for a duration.
Dark Sanctorum: Call of the Abyss

Every {turns}[turn/], the Abyss calls to all. Non-Mindless attacking units have a strength {CallOfTheAbyssStrength} chance to become [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred] until the end of combat. If resisted, they suffer [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] for {BrokenMindDuration}[turn/] instead.
每 {turns}[turn/]，深渊会向所有人发出呼唤。非无意识的攻击单位有 {CallOfTheAbyssStrength} 力量几率陷入[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]，持续至战斗结束。如果被抵抗，则改为受到[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]，持续 {BrokenMindDuration}[turn/]。
Filled with despair and Broken mind are negative status effects. They are psychological and affect the mind.

Every {turns}[turn/], Celestian favor aids the defense. Attacking units have a strength {CelestianFavorSoulblazeStrength} chance to suffer [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] until the end of combat. Defending units gain [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] and are healed for {CelestianFavorHeal}.
每 {turns}[turn/]，防守者便会获得星神的恩赐，攻击单位有 {CelestianFavorSoulblazeStrength} 力量几率遭受[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]，持续至战斗结束。防守单位获得[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]，治疗 {CelestianFavorHeal}。

Soulburn is a negative status effect that affects the enemy's soul. Enlightened is a postive status effect that means that the unit is following the Path of Light of the celestian, a religion type thing.

Every {turns}[turn/], the vault's purification protocols initialize, choosing {PurificationProtocolsTargetNumber} random hostile targets, dispersing PyrX gas to those and adjacent hexes. Biological and Cyborg ground units caught in the cloud are inflicted with [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred]. After {Timer}[turn/], the cloud explodes, dealing {ExplDamage} damage with [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred].

每 {turns}[turn/]，宝库的净化协议将会启动，选择 {PurificationProtocolsTargetNumber} 个随机敌方目标，向这些目标及其附近的单元格散布派尔克斯气体。处于云雾内的生物和半机械人陆地单位会被[abilityred]窒息[/abilityred]。{Timer}[turn/]后，云雾将发生爆炸，造成 {ExplDamage} 伤害并造成[abilityred]强力冲击[/abilityred]。
Immolated is a negative status effect. Immolated means covered in fire, taking fire damage every turn and running around in a panic (as you do)

The adaptive nature of the Synthesis network grants all defending units [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] and [abilityblue]Adaptive Network[/abilityblue] granting them {AdaptiveNetworkBuff} whenever they take damage. This can stack up to {stacks} times.
合成网络适应环境的天性使得所有防守单位均获得[abilityblue]融合体[/abilityblue]和[abilityblue]适应性网络[/abilityblue]，当这些单位受到伤害时，给予其 {AdaptiveNetworkBuff}。
Integrated is a positive status effect, that means the unit is connected via cybernetic implants to a network. Adaptive network is a positive status effect as well.
This unit gains {AdaptiveNetworkShields} whenever it is damaged. This can stack up to {stacks} times.
该单位在受到伤害时获得{AdaptiveNetworkShields}。
This unit has gained {AdaptiveNetworkShields} in response to recently sustained damage. This can stack up to {stacks} times.
该单位因近期持续受到伤害而获得{AdaptiveNetworkShields}。
虚空科技建筑群：相位守护者

Every {turns}[turn/], the unstable systems of the Voidtech complex create an Unstable Echo of a random unit. Unstable Echoes deal 50% less damage, but are otherwise indistinguishable from the original.
每 {turns}[turn/]，虚空科技建筑群内的不稳定系统便会为一个随机目标创造一个不稳定回声。不稳定回声只能造成 50% 的伤害，但除此之外与本体并无区别。
异星疫病实验室：传染性蒸汽

Every {turns}[turn/], the infectious vapors of the Xenoplague infect a random attacking unit. That unit takes {InfectiousVapoursDamage} damage, with a strength {InfectiousVapoursStrength} chance to suffer [abilityred]Unstable Contamination[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] for {InfectiousVaporsTurns}[turn/]. The effect jumps to another target within {InfectiousVapoursJumpRange} hexes up to {InfectiousVapoursJumpMax} times.

每 {turns}[turn/]，带有异星疫病的传染性蒸汽会对一名随机进攻单位进行传染。该单位会受到 {InfectiousVapoursDamage} 伤害，有 {InfectiousVapoursStrength} 力量几率陷入[abilityred]不稳定污染[/abilityred]和[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]，持续 {InfectiousVaporsTurns}[turn/]。该效果还会跳转至 {InfectiousVapoursJumpRange} 个单元格内的其他单位，最多跳转 {InfectiousVapoursJumpMax} 次。

Unstable Contamination is a negative status effect which poisons the unit, dealing damage over time. Parasitic infection lowers the resistances of a unit. This effect can 'jump' meaning it can go from one unit to another, crossing empty hexes in combat.

This will leave a razed version of this structure, which can be rebuilt later if you own the sector containing the structure. A razed version of this structure will have none of the listed effects active.
该建筑被夷为平地之后将会留下一片残骸，如果你拥有该建筑所在的区域，之后可以重新修建该建筑。建筑被夷平后将不会激活任何效果。
[abilityred]This structure has been razed, and currently none of its effects are active.[/abilityred]If you own the sector, you may restore this structure, reactivating its effects and benefits.
[abilityred]该建筑已被夷平，目前没有任何激活的效果。[/abilityred]如果你拥有该区域，你可以重新修建该建筑，从而恢复其效果和收益。
Restore this structure to its original form, reactivating its effects upon completion.
将该建筑恢复到原始形式，重建完成后重新激活效果。
edit: removed will and added reactivating
This structure is currently being rebuilt. Completion in [INT_duration].
该建筑正在重建，将于 [INT_duration] 后完成。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
